text: Oh how I love you 😍, seriously 😍
Remember our first date? That was magic 🌸 Seeing you for the first time, holding your hands, and just being with you was the best thing that ever happened to me.
I love the way you smile 😊, it's so beautiful and it makes my heart flutter 💘
Remember sitting at Prem Mandir? Us getting to know each other, taking pictures, and just being together.
Even before we started dating. I had a crush on you 😍, raat ko ham aurora lights dekhne gaye the, aapko mai signals de rha tha 😂
I'll buy you the prettiest Jhumke
You make the most amazing Minecraft builds 🏠
My Fav Person in the whole universe 💫
To impress this person, I started making so many things. Remember Lemon poset? Aapko impress karna tha!
Calling each other again and again on snap till the time you got a pretty color
Waking up and making chai so I can get to call you and say good morning 😊
Our Dandilion, yes it's that picture 🌼
I know you like this one
THE POOKIEST OF THE POOKIES!
Wo DJ Dandiya nights wala apka Lehenga! 🤏
Meri Girlfriend kya hottie hai! 👀
Love doing so many activities with you! We should do crocheting together 🧶
Us in that Museum togetherm Ahhhh!! What a memory 😍
My Day starts with you and it ends with you!
Even with this distance, I feel like I am with you
IF YOU SEE THIS, This means its your LUCKY DAY!!!
Attending your first concert together 🎶
Every Pretty flower reminds me of you 🌸
